subject: Boxing
Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: Deontay Wilder, 22, has applied his sense of right and wrong to an amateur career that, to everyone but him and his coach, grows more improbable every day.
snippet: Deontay Wilder, 22, has applied his sense of right and wrong to an amateur career that, to everyone but him and his coach, grows more improbable every day.
